Dineo Seshee Bopape bụ ome nka na-eme ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi South Africa
site n'iji ihe ngosi video nnwale , ụda, ihe ndị a chọtara, foto na nrụnye ọkpụkpụ, ihe osise ya "na-etinye aka na echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ebe dị elu nke ebe nchekwa, akụkọ na ihe nnọchianya."
A mụrụ Bopape na Polokwane, South Africa n'afọ 1981
Ọ gụrụ gbasara eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Durban Institute of Technology, wee gụchaa De Atelier na Amsterdam na 2007
Na 2010 ọ gụchara MFA na Mahadum Columbia na New York
N'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ, ọrụ Bopape gosipụtara na New Museum, Institute of Contemporary Art, Philadelphia, na 12th Biennale de Lyon
Edokwala ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Mart House Gallery, Amsterdam; Kwazulu Natal Society of Arts, Durban; na Palais de Tokyo

Bopape bụ onye mmeri nke MTN New Contemporaries Award nke afọ 2008, onye natara 2010 Columbia University Toby Fund Awards, 2017 Sharjah Biennial Prize, na onye mmeri nke Future Generation Art Prize 2017

N'afọ 2018, o sonyekwara na 10th Berlin Biennale, nke Gabi Ngcobo na ndị otu nlekọta nke gụnyere Nomaduma Rosa Masilela, Serubiri Moses, Thiago de Paula Souza na Yvette Mutumba haziri. Ntinye ya, nke akpọrọ Untitled (Of Occult Instability)[Feelings], 2016–18 dị na ogo dị ala nke KW Institute for Contemporary Art

N'etiti ihe mkpofu, ma mee ya maka biennale, e ji ọkụ nwere ụgha oroma wee gosi ọrụ na-agụnye n'etiti vidiyo ya ihe nkiri banyere nwoke ọcha na-akwaso nwanyị ojii iko n'ike na ihe nkiri nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama bụ Nina Simone nwere nsogbu odida mba akon'uche n'ogbọ ihe omume Ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Tate.
